turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help u today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'd like to order drink for pick up from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did u want to order from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u say grande cherry mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, i don't see that on their menu.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u mean another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, could I get a cinnamon dolce latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take that in grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what type of milk did u want in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get whipped cream on top of that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so u said a grande hot cinnamon dulce latte with whole milk and whipped cream from starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which starbucks should i place this order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on North 18th Street in Centerville, Iowa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total is $4.50. i'll place the order at starbucks on north 18th street in centerville iowa shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've placed the order. the drink will be ready in 10 minutes. do u need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool. have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
